about_the_game:
It's a game that is played with a mouse in which you are looking for a way to charge your battery and jump in another dimension. While your battery is charging you are free to explore and interact with that dimension. The battery is charging for one minute but you can stay longer if you want to. While you may change the dimensions, the dimension may also change you.

Key Features:


  • The Demo version of the game contains about a 1/3 of the content of the full game
  • Explore diverse, conceptual dimensions: Each world presents unique visuals, themes, and puzzles.
  • Charge your battery, unlock interactions: Click and interact with objects and characters as your battery regenerates.
  • Challenge your perspective: Engage with complex themes and ethical dilemmas in a playful yet thought-provoking way.
  • Immersive 3D environment: Explore vibrant landscapes and interact with the world in full 3D.

It's a game that is played with a mouse in which you are looking for a way to charge your battery and jump in another dimension. While your battery is charging you are free to explore and interact with that dimension. The battery is charging for one minute but you can stay longer if you want to. While you may change the dimensions, the dimension may also change you.

  • Charge your battery, unlock interactions: Click and interact with objects and characters as your battery regenerates.

name: Melting Encyclopedia Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 8096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Blaster or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
